name: Rmh-homeroomcivi
body:
Instructors or developers who are interested in adapting RMH-Homeroomcivi for a different non-profit application may freely download and use any of the following resources as a starting point:

1.  [Design document](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B89idqv1KuSVbUdPd2dHX0VTOWM/view?usp=sharing)
2.  [Code base](https://github.com/megandalster/rmh-homeroomcivi)
3.  ["Sandbox" database](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B89idqv1KuSVZUVqTXhUekc0cWM/view?usp=sharing)
4.  [Course syllabus](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B89idqv1KuSVLUV4YWtLb29VZ2c/view?usp=sharing) 
5.  [Weekly assignments](https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B89idqv1KuSVX2VjYlBGQlpaVDQ&usp=sharing)
6.  [Final class presentation]()
7.  [Student evaluations]()

These resources are all licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.

Detailed guidance on adapting these materials to a new course is available in our book "Open Source Software Development," which will soon appear as a Kindle book.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
